module: Module-level comment: The clkdivider module halves the frequency of an input clock (`clk`) by toggling the output clock (`out_clk`) every other rising edge of `clk`. A 2-bit counter (`clk_count`) increments on each `clk` rising edge. The module uses `clk_count`'s MSB to set `out_clk`, with a synchronous `reset` resetting the states.
